title: Print, "The Morning Bell, from Harper's Weekly, December 13, 1873, p. 1116.", December 13, 1873
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.
description: Horizontal view of a wooden foot-bridge leading over a stream and a group of people, all carrying pails, crossing it.  A girl at the extreme right turns to look at the spectator.  In the background a bell is ringing on the roof of a large house.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "The Morning Bell, from Harper's Weekly, December 13, 1873, p. 1116.", December 13, 1873.
December 13, 1873. Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.. Gift of Arthur B. Carlson. 1951-93-14.
